name: Kanban Board - Light / Dark mode
description:
Kanban board to organise your team tasks in a single place. This will give you an overall picture of the task in hand for PM and developers.


Card can be customised to show title, description, task owner, due date, tags, sub-tasks, and link for external tracking.


Supports Autolayout and new links feature.


Have suggestions? DM me @hellogunaseelan on Twitter.
